headlines.description: A late equaliser from Everton substitute Theo Walcott denied Aston Villa three points in their fight to avoid relegation in a 1-1 draw.
headlines.shortLinkText: Late Walcott header denies Villa win at Everton

headlines.description: Leicester City boosted their hopes of finishing in the top four as Ayoze Perez and Demarai Gray secured a 2-0 win over Sheffield United.

video.headline: Hislop: Leicester finally showed up when they needed to

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL FCTV (Hislop: Leicester finally showed up when they needed to) 2020/7/16 Global

headlines.shortLinkText: Leicester boost top-four hopes with 2-0 win over Blades

headlines.description: Manchester United moved back level with fourth-place Leicester following their 2-0 victory over Crystal Palace.

video.headline: Man United's Martial is 'absolutely dynamite' right now

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL FCTV (Man United's Martial is 'absolutely dynamite' right now) 2020/7/16 Global

headlines.shortLinkText: Man Utd beat Palace with Rashford, Martial goals

headlines.description: Brighton & Hove Albion all but ensured their Premier League status for another season as they held out for a 1-1 draw with Southampton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brighton all but safe after draw at Southampton
